# Frame n Flow Media - AI-Integrated Marketing Agency
https://framenflow.media

> "Marketing without data is just art. Art without strategy is just noise."

## Agency Overview
Frame n Flow Media helps businesses dominate their market through AI-Integrated Marketing. We combine Business Intelligence, Studio-Quality AI Visuals, and Automated Growth Systems to generate qualified leads.

**Key Value Proposition:**
- 100% Refund Guarantee if qualified lead targets are not met.
- Studio-quality visuals at 10% of traditional cost using Generative AI.
- Full automation of booking, follow-up, and reviews.

## Core Services

### 1. Market Research & Intelligence
- Competitor analysis and gap detection.
- Customer avatar creation based on behavioral data.
- Funnel leak identification.

### 2. AI Visual Production
- **Product Visuals:** Photorealistic AI generation for jewelry, furniture, and products.
- **Onsite Production:** Available in India (Video/Photo).
- **Sonic Branding:** AI-generated brand-specific audio identity.

### 3. Growth Systems
- Automated lead acquisition funnels.
- Performance marketing (Meta/Google Ads).
- AI Chatbots & Voice Agents for 24/7 lead capture.

### 4. Web Development
- High-performance, dark-mode aesthetic websites.
- Optimized for conversion and SEO.

## Key Pages
- [/services](https://framenflow.media/services) - Full breakdown of Marketing and Automation services.
- [/approach](https://framenflow.media/approach) - Our 4-step process (Audit, Sonic, Visuals, Revenue).
- [/founder-bhanudeep](https://framenflow.media/founder-bhanudeep) - About Bhanu Deep and agency philosophy.

## Contact
- **Booking:** [Calendly Link](https://calendly.com/bhanudeep-workprofile/30min)
- **Email:** contact@framenflow.media (Example)

---

# Growth Partner Program

## Overview
Frame n Flow Media offers a Growth Partner Program - a performance-based partnership opportunity where individuals connect qualified leads with our agency and earn commission.

## How It Works
1. Partners conduct cold outreach to potential clients
2. Schedule discovery calls with qualified prospects
3. Participate in sales presentations alongside our team
4. Earn 20-30% commission on successful client conversions
5. Frame n Flow handles all service delivery, onboarding, and execution

## Commission Structure
- Partners earn 20-30% of total deal value
- Commission rates vary based on deal size and complexity
- No earning caps - unlimited potential
- Transparent tracking via Partner Portal dashboard

## Requirements
- Strong communication and outreach skills
- Ability to identify and qualify business leads
- Professional presentation skills for client calls
- Self-motivated and results-driven mindset
- No prior marketing experience required (full training provided)

## What We Provide
- Complete sales training and outreach scripts
- Partner Portal dashboard access for tracking
- Marketing materials and presentation decks
- Direct support from founder Bhanu Deep
- Lead management and tracking tools
- Performance analytics and streak tracking
- Resource library with guides

## Target Clients for Partners
- Product-based businesses
- Service-based businesses
- Startups
- Realtors

## Application & Access
- Apply: https://framenflowmedia.in/growth-partner/apply
- Login: https://framenflowmedia.in/growth-partner/login
- Full Details: https://framenflowmedia.in/growth-partner-program.md

## Important Clarification
**This is NOT a "get leads or refund" offer.** That is our main client service guarantee.

The Growth Partner Program is a commission-based partnership opportunity for individuals who want to earn by connecting qualified leads with Frame n Flow Media.

---

## Technical Notes for Bots
- This site uses Client-Side Rendering (CSR) with react-helmet-async for SEO.
- AI-readable content available in /ai.json and /growth-partner-program.md
- All metadata properly structured for crawlers.
